p0801-beol:StandoffEntityTag.rdfs:comment: represents an entity (<entity>) tag in text

p0801-beol:StandoffFacsimileTag.rdfs:comment: a URI referring to a facsimile

p0801-beol:StandoffHtmlTag.rdfs:comment: represents a HTML tag in MediaWiki

p0801-beol:StandoffNoWikiTag.rdfs:comment: escapes a special character in the MediaWiki syntax

p0801-beol:StandoffReferenceTag.rdfs:comment: represents a footnote (<ref>) tag in MediaWiki

p0801-beol:StandoffSmallTag.rdfs:comment: Represents text in small letters format in a TextValue

p0801-beol:page.rdfs:comment: A page is a part of a convolute
p0801-beol:page.rdfs:label: Page

p0801-beol:publishedLetter.rdfs:comment: A resource representing a published letter
p0801-beol:publishedLetter.rdfs:label: Published Letter

p0801-beol:archiveHasAbbreviation.rdfs:comment: Represents the abbreviation of name of archive.
p0801-beol:archiveHasAbbreviation.rdfs:label: Archive Arbbreviation

p0801-beol:beolIDs.rdfs:comment: Represents IDs given to a person.
p0801-beol:beolIDs.rdfs:label: BEOL-IDs

p0801-beol:hasDictionaryEntries.rdfs:comment: Represents entries in dictionaries about the person.
p0801-beol:hasDictionaryEntries.rdfs:label: Dictionary Entries

p0801-beol:hasFloruitPlace.rdfs:comment: Represents a place a person is seen.
p0801-beol:hasFloruitPlace.rdfs:label: Place of Floruit

p0801-beol:hasMarriagePlace.rdfs:comment: Represents a place a person is married in.
p0801-beol:hasMarriagePlace.rdfs:label: Place of Marriage

p0801-beol:letterHasRepertoriumNumber.rdfs:comment: Number in Repertorium of Euler correspondence (O.IVA/1, p.134-166)
p0801-beol:letterHasRepertoriumNumber.rdfs:label: Repertorium-Number

p0801-beol:letterIsReplyTo.rdfs:comment: Letter is reply to another letter
p0801-beol:letterIsReplyTo.rdfs:label: Reply to

p0801-beol:letterIsReplyToValue.rdfs:comment: Letter is reply to another letter
p0801-beol:letterIsReplyToValue.rdfs:label: Reply to

p0801-beol:location.rdfs:comment: Place where the physical original is located
p0801-beol:location.rdfs:label: Location

p0801-beol:manuscriptHasArchive.rdfs:comment: Represents the archive where manuscript is stored.
p0801-beol:manuscriptHasArchive.rdfs:label: Archive of Manuscript

p0801-beol:manuscriptHasArchiveValue.rdfs:comment: Represents the archive where manuscript is stored.
p0801-beol:manuscriptHasArchiveValue.rdfs:label: Archive of Manuscript

p0801-beol:manuscriptHasShelfMark.rdfs:comment: Represents the shelf mark of manuscript in archive.
p0801-beol:manuscriptHasShelfMark.rdfs:label: Shelfmark

p0801-beol:mentionedIn.rdfs:comment: Represents where the resource is mentioned .
p0801-beol:mentionedIn.rdfs:label: Mentioned In

p0801-beol:pagenum.rdfs:comment: A distinct identification of a page
p0801-beol:pagenum.rdfs:label: Page identifier

p0801-beol:partOf.rdfs:comment: Represents a relation to another resource of which this resource is a part (dependent)
p0801-beol:partOf.rdfs:label: is a part of

p0801-beol:partOfValue.rdfs:comment: Diese Property bezeichnet eine Verbindung zu einer anderen Resource, in dem ausgesagt wird, dass die vorliegende Resource ein integraler Teil der anderen Resource ist. Zum Beispiel ist eine Buchseite ein integraler Bestandteil genau eines Buches.
p0801-beol:partOfValue.rdfs:label: is a part of

p0801-beol:publishedLetterEndPage.rdfs:comment: Represents end-page of letter in Edition.
p0801-beol:publishedLetterEndPage.rdfs:label: End Page in Edition

p0801-beol:publishedLetterHasSeqnum.rdfs:comment: Represents sequence number of letter in Edition.
p0801-beol:publishedLetterHasSeqnum.rdfs:label: Sequence Number in Edition

p0801-beol:publishedLetterStartPage.rdfs:comment: Represents start page of letter in Edition.
p0801-beol:publishedLetterStartPage.rdfs:label: Start Page in Edition

p0801-beol:seqnum.rdfs:comment: This property stands for the position within a set of rdered items (resoucres)
p0801-beol:seqnum.rdfs:label: Sequence number

p0801-beol:standoffFontType.rdfs:comment: Represents a webfont type for special character

p0801-beol:standoffTableCellTagHasAlignm.rdfs:comment: settings for the alignment of a table cell

p0801-beol:standoffTableCellTagHasColumn.rdfs:comment: settings for column span of a table cell

p0801-beol:standoffTableCellTagHasRowSpa.rdfs:comment: settings for row span of a table cell

p0801-beol:standoffTableCellTagHasStyle.rdfs:comment: settings for the style of a table cell

p0801-beol:standoffTableCellTagHasVertic.rdfs:comment: settings for the vertical alignment of a table cell

p0801-beol:standoffTableCellTagHasWidth.rdfs:comment: settings for the wifth of a table cell
